entry.title: Blackpink's Jennie tops iTunes charts in 47 regions with 'Mantra'
entry.content: Singer Jennie of Blackpink has topped the iTunes charts in 47 regions around the world with her latest release "Mantra," her agency Odd Atelier said Saturday. "Mantra" was released Friday as her singer's latest single under her self-established agency.
